Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.assets

Interface Asset

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimatedTexture, DataAsset, Icon, Sound, Texture, TextureAtlas, Typeface
public interface Asset
An external asset. This tagging interface groups assets allowing them to be stored in an AssetsBundle. Kyanite provides several basic types of assets, but the programmer should feel free to implement this interface in their own asset types.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static @NotNull InputStream
    internal(@NotNull Object reference, @NotNull String path)
    Finds a resource file with a given path.

  • Method Details

    • internal

      @NotNull @Contract(pure=true, value="_, _ -> new") static @NotNull InputStream internal(@NotNull @NotNull Object reference, @NotNull @NotNull String path)
      Finds a resource file with a given path. The path must be relative to the module source root package. For instance, if the file is located at project_name/src/res/sound/step1.ogg, then the specified path must be "res/sound/step1.ogg". Needs a reference to an object of any class that is in the same module as the desired resource.
      Parameters:
      reference - object of any class from the same module as the desired resource
      path - the path to the desired file (relative to the module source root package)
      Returns:
      an InputStream from the specified file
      Throws:
      IOException - if no resource with this name is found, or access to the resource is denied by the security manager or path is null
